title: Verbo: Realize Your Goals
description: Verbo is a mobile app that helps you commit to your goals by enabling you to state your goals out loud and reflect back on your hard work every week.
footerText: Try Verbo for 21 days and experience the power of verbal commitments.

title: FUEL
description: A web prototype that allows you to find UI-related bugs in your Flutter apps and check if the app adheres to the design guidelines enforced by major app stores.
footerText: Simply paste your code and improve the user experience of your apps.

title: Amazing Package Analzyer
description: A web prototype that allows you to find bugs in your package integration implementation in Flutter apps.
footerText: Let's be more confident when using third-party packages in our apps.

title: Rate Features
description: A chrome extension that summarizes app reviews into abstract, domain-specific rate features.
footerText: Let's find you an app that matches your goals.
